"Monstah Black" (amụrụ na Colonial Williamsburg, Virginia) bụ ónyé America na-edekọ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, onye egwu, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke bi na Bedford-Stuyvesant, New York. N'afọ 2015, ọ natara Tom Murrin Performance Award.
BLACK malitere ịrụ ọrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ ise. Ọ gàrà Bruton High School, Williamsburg, ebe ọ gụrụ egwu "International Lover" nke Prince
Ọ na-akọwa oge uto ya dị ka otu n'ime ọgụ na "ógè obi ụtọ", ma kọwaa afọ iri na ụma ya dị ka "ọganihu, nhọrọ, androgynous"
Prince, Boy George na New York Dolls nwere mmetụta n'ịma mma ejiji ya.

BLACK 2016 show 'HYPBERLOIC! (ihe ngosi ikpeazụ) ' ka Eric Marlin kọwara, na New York Theater Review, dị ka "ihe a na-ahụ ányà karịa okwu, ihe na-agbakọta karịa akụkọ", ebe "ọ bụghị akụkụ ọ bụla ga-abụrịrị na ọrụ nke isi édémédé".
Dị ka "The Illustrious Blacks", ha esorola na egwu egwu, dị ka EP "NeoAfro Futuristic Psychedelic Surrealistic Hippyz wepụtara na Concierge Records, na 2016 live performance ŌHyperbolicz.
